name: eToro
descriptions: Improving and maintaining one of the world’s leading broker platforms.

name: Academy IT Step
descriptions: Teaching the fundamentals of front-end development.
I cover topics such as HTML, CSS, SCSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Angular, Angular Material, and provide a brief introduction to RxJS.
Working closely with the management to improve the teaching process.

name: Freelance
descriptions: Delivering and maintaining full-stack software to clients in Georgia.
